fields.name: Why?
fields.value: Discord is restricting access to their message contents API. Queue Bot does not qualify for continued access because it's use of message contents is redundant to slash commands.

fields.name: Support the Bot :heart:
fields.value:
Hosting isn't free and development takes lots of time.
1. [Leave a review on top.gg](https://top.gg/bot/679018301543677959).
2. [Buy me a coffee](https://www.buymeacoffee.com/Arroww).

fields.name: Pull people to you (`/to-me`)
fields.value: Pull users out of voice queues directly to you with `/to-me`.

fields.name: Lock and unlock queues (`/lock`)
fields.value: Lock queues to prevent new users from joining with `/lock`. (`/enqueue` will still work).

fields.name: Option to disable roles (`/roles`)
fields.value: Now you can disable `In Queue: ...` roles without messing with permissions or seeing error messages. Simply use `/roles set off`.

fields.name: +`/whitelist`
fields.value: You now create whitelisted queues. If a queue has a whitelist (at least 1 user or role), it's blacklist will be ignored. Anyone not on the whitelist will be blocked from joining the queue.

fields.name: List clearing
fields.value: `/blacklist`, `/permission`, and `/priority` now have a `clear` subcommand.

fields.name: Support the Bot :heart:
fields.value:
Hosting isn't free and development takes lots of time.
1. [Leave a review on top.gg](https://top.gg/bot/679018301543677959).
2. [Buy me a coffee](https://www.buymeacoffee.com/Arroww).

embeds.title: Slash Commands
embeds.description:
**IMPORTANT**: The bot needs new permissions. Do not kick the bot (this will delete your data). **Use this [INVITE LINK](https://discord.com/api/oauth2/authorize?client_id=679018301543677959&permissions=2433838096&scope=applications.commands%20bot) to update the permissions**. After this message is sent, it make take up to an hour for the slash commands to show up for everyone.
​

fields.name: Old Command Prefixes are Gone
fields.value: The old `!` prefix **and custom prefixes** have been removed. All commands now start with `/`. For example `/help`.

fields.name: Command Hints
fields.value: You no longer need to remember bot commands. Slash commands provide auto-complete and hints.

fields.name: + `/priority`
fields.value: You can now manage a list of priority users and roles. Priority users skip ahead of other users in queue.

fields.name: + `/enqueue`
fields.value: Add other users to a queue. (Previously a part of `!join`).

fields.name: + `/kickall`
fields.value: Kick a user from all queues. (Previously a part of `!kick`).

fields.name: `/color`
fields.value: Colors are linked to queues now. If you have multiple queues, they can be different colors.

fields.name: `/graceperiod`
fields.value: Grace periods are also linked to queues now.

fields.name: `/help`
fields.value:
The help command has been split into sections:
`/help` - basic commands for everyone
`/help setup` - setup instructions for admins
`/help queues` - queue customization commands for admins
`/help bot` - non-queue customization commands for admins

fields.name: `/permission`
fields.value: Before, you could only give access to bot commands to individual users via `!addrole`. Now, the `/permission` commands can be used on users **and roles**.

fields.name: `/blacklist`
fields.value: Similar to the permissions, you can now blacklist users **and roles**.

fields.name: Buttons
fields.value: Joining queues via reaction has been replaced with joining via a button.

fields.name: General Improvements
fields.value: This update also includes some improvements to wording, formatting, and performance, as well as some bug fixes.

embeds.title: Final Notes
embeds.description: This update involved rewriting most of the original code. It also required switching to a beta release of discord.js. So, there will probably be some new bugs. If you find a bug or have a suggestion, please let me know by sending a message in the [Support Server](https://discord.com/invite/RbmfnP3). There is also a link to the support server in the `/help setup` message.

fields.name: Support the Bot :heart:
fields.value:
Hosting isn't free and development takes lots of time.
1. [Leave a review on top.gg](https://top.gg/bot/679018301543677959).
2. [Buy me a coffee](https://www.buymeacoffee.com/Arroww).

embeds.title: Patch Notes for Apr 20, 2021
embeds.description: Two queue management role commands have been added.

fields.name: +Add a Queue Management Role
fields.value: `!addrole {role name}` enables a role to manage queues. Before, you had to be a mod or admin.

fields.name: +Revoke a Queue Management Role
fields.value: `!deleterole {role name}` revokes a role's ability to manage queues. Before, you had to be a mod or admin.

fields.name: Support the Bot :heart:
fields.value:
1. [Review the bot on top.gg](https://top.gg/bot/679018301543677959).
2. [Buy me a coffee](https://www.buymeacoffee.com/Arroww).

embeds.title: Patch Notes for Dec 21, 2020
embeds.description: Some core commands have been renamed and a few commands have been added.

fields.name: Renamed Commands
fields.value:
`!d` > `!display`
`!q` > `!queue`
`!s` > `!start`

`!j` > `!join`
`!k` > `!kick`
`!n` > `!next`
`!h` > `!help`

fields.name: +Delete a Queue
fields.value: `!delete {queue name}` deletes a queue. Before, you could delete queues using `!q`. This has been moved to its own command.

fields.name: +Header
fields.value:
`!header {queue name} {message}` adds a message to the top of the queue displays. This is intended for displaying game codes.
For example, `!header #Waiting-Room join code: 7GAVD3` for displaying an Among Us game code.

fields.name: +Mention Queue
fields.value: `!mention {queue name} {OPTIONAL: message}` mentions everyone in a queue. You can add an optional message.

fields.name: +My Queues
fields.value: `!myqueues` displays your position in each queue they have joined. It is available to everyone. (These messages aren't automatically updated).

fields.name: +Blacklist
fields.value:
`!blacklist {queue name} @{user 1} @{user 2} ...` blacklists users from a queue. Use again to remove them from a blacklist.
`!blacklist {queue name}` displays a queue's blacklist.

fields.name: General Changes
fields.value: Commands will now use the current channel if a channel is not specified. For example, sending `!display` and `!display general` in the `general` channel will do the same thing.

fields.name: Support the Bot :heart:
fields.value:
1. [Review the bot on top.gg](https://top.gg/bot/679018301543677959).
2. [Buy me a coffee](https://www.buymeacoffee.com/Arroww).

embeds.title: Patch Notes for Dec 5, 2020
embeds.description: There are some big features changes to highlight.

fields.name: +Autofill (voice)
fields.value:
New default behavior. The bot will set a "target" when you drag it from a queue to a new channel. If the new channel has a user limit, the bot will automatically move people when spots open up in the target channel. The bot can be disconnected from voice chat after setting a target channel.
Autofill can be toggled using `!autofill {queue name} {on|off}`.

fields.name: +Joining via Reaction (text)
fields.value: Users can join text queues by clicking on the reaction under the queue display. `!j` is sticking around, but reactions should be a bit cleaner.

fields.name: +Pull Amounts (voice & text)
fields.value: `!pullnum {queue name} {#}` sets the default number of people to pull when Autofill is off or when using `!n`.

fields.name: +Size Limits (voice & text)
fields.value: `!limit {queue name} {#}` sets queue size limit.

fields.name: +Command Cleanup
fields.value: `!cleanup {on|off}` toggles the automatic deletion Queue Bot commands sent by users. This is off by default.

fields.name: General Improvements
fields.value: I recently upgraded the hosting solution and fixed a bunch of bugs. The bot is still under active development so please join the [support server](https://discord.gg/RbmfnP3) if you find a bug or have an idea for a new feature.

fields.name: Support the Bot :heart:
fields.value:
Hosting isn't free and development takes a lot of time. There are a couple new ways to support the bot and future development:
1. [Review the bot on top.gg](https://top.gg/bot/679018301543677959).
2. [Buy me a coffee](https://www.buymeacoffee.com/Arroww).
